website_summaries.verdict: Climbers will appreciate the features that make these crampons practical for tackling tough, mountainous regions, but may not like the price tag.
pros: Strap and metal attachment system provides security while fitting most types of hiking boots
Long, grippy spikes make them ideal for climbing and rugged terrain
cons: Expensive, yet don't offer better quality or features than less pricey options made for climbs
May not fit men's boots in large sizes, especially 13 and larger

customer_reviews.title: Worked well, don’t use with keen style boots
customer_reviews.text: Works great, just make sure you don’t have big rounded toe and heel co structure in your boot. A few of us did some alpine hiking in Colorado in June (snow) and needed these. Two of us had boots with rounded toe and heel rubber. Great for hiking but they don’t match well with these. They kept falling off. We ended up tightening them so hard that my toes of the boot bent up significantly and my foot arched backward. Only then did they stay on. Great product just get some boots that will work well with crampons if you’re really going to depend on them.
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Be advised.
customer_reviews.text: Be advised, these crampons may require the longer bars. My AMERICAN size 12 Columbia Low top Hike boots needed one more hole. I am rating the product quality here and not my disappointment in the way the product is offered. You can't order these with a choice of bar lengths. If they are too short, you will need to give Black Diamond more money. Simply consider the total cost. They ARE worth it though. EXCELLENT crampon. Totally satisfied with the performance and construction. I learned of this crampon from a friend who highly recommended them. I own other excellent Black Diamond products.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel B. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: nice crampons, fit is a little goofy for my size 11 shoes
customer_reviews.text: My main issue is that the toe cap is too small and tends to scoot to one side or the other of my shoe and I have to crank them *really* hard for them to not come loose. I'm wearing size 11 shoes so maybe it's a deal of my feet being too big, smaller feet probably have better wrap from the toe cap. I've gotten used to them and still bring them with me as a general mountaineering crampon to wear with my mid-weight hiking boots.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: Great fit - worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I tried a pair of automatic Petzl’s but they just didn’t fit perfectly with my moutaineering boots. I bought these as a backup and they fit so much better. I found them much easier to attach as well. Used them on Izta in Mexico and they worked flawlessly. Very happy and anxious to use again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gorman

customer_reviews.title: good grip, strap easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fir my Solomon boots, crampon too narrow on the heel. wish I could replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outdated strapping system
customer_reviews.text: It seems everyone uses these, despite poor non-intuitive method of strapping to boots. They come loose and I'm not sure what to do with excess strap. Printed instructions are hard to read because the squeezed in instructions for 3 different types of crampons. I had to get instructions in .pdf format so I could zoom in and see illustrations more clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Brown

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I used these Black Diamond Contact Crampons to claim Mt. Saint Helens and they got me to the summit. Since I didn't have Mountaineering boots I was worried how this would work on a regular but sturdy pair of Danner hiking boots. They strapped on nicely without any movement and never loosened on the climb. they are extremely well made and easy to adjust. I would recommend a very sturdy soled hiking boot or better yet mountaineering boot for more technical climbs. Very happy with them and they will accompany me up South Sister very soon!
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Durable good quality, wore them on a Mt. Adams summit, 12,000 + ft and they did great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy to put on and easy to secure
customer_reviews.text: easy to put on and easy to secure. Had some problems with other strap-on crampons coming off in the past, but so far these have been bomber.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Good for intended purposes
customer_reviews.text: Easy on ,easy off. I used these on mount Washington nh
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Gilbrook

customer_reviews.title: Quality at a reasonable price. Tested these recently climbing ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality at a reasonable price. Tested these recently climbing the chute to Mt. Whitney. Can't go wrong with these, would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another Fine BD Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a friend but they worked very very well for him while glaciering in Alaska. I've also bought many many Black Diamond products and their stuff is second to none.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for trekking up the snow. Good value and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with quality of the product. Size is adjusted easily (and reliably), sturdy. Locks solidly over hiking boots (the model that I got is not intended for any technical ice-climbing) Fairly simple to put on (if you are not familiar with crampons - put them on at home, it is not fun trying to figure it out when it is cold and dark).
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: returned them because they were too small to fit my ...
customer_reviews.text: returned them because they were too small to fit my size 13 boots. Black Diamond offer an extender bar but I could't get one in time for my trip.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: Try some communication about what boots these wont fit on.
customer_reviews.text: My complaint is industry wide: why on earth isn't there a decent crampon for hiking pack boots?? It's gonna take some work to get them to stay on. And why did I have to dig into blogs as to why the flex bar is so short? Guys, not everyone was born with a carbine in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas K. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ordered as a gift. not for personal use so can't rate them
customer_reviews.author: Emilie Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertized
customer_reviews.text: I expected that the BD Contact I bought would be a light polished alloy like shown in the picture, but they were made of heavy grey steel. They were supposed to be a lightweight alternative to my Grivel G12s, but in fact weighs about the same as the G12, except that they are only 10 point and do not provide any benefit in regard to weight or performance. Had it been mentioned in the product description that they were steel I would have never bought them. I am trying to return them from the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Penaskovic

customer_reviews.title: FITS MY SIZE 14 BOOT AND WOULD PROBABLY GO 16 AFTER THE EXTENDER
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT A PAIR FROM A COMPETITOR BECAUSE IT WAS CHEAPER. WOULD NOT FIT MY SIZE 14 BOOT. I ORDERED THIS BLACK DIAMOND CRAMPON AND THE EXTENSION BAR WITH IT. MY SIZE 14 BOOT EASILY FITS INTO IT. AS A MATTER OF FACT I HAD TO TAKE THE SLACK OUT. IT WOULD PROBABLY FIT A 16 FOR MEN. THE QUALITY OF THIS CRAMPON IS OUTSTANDING. I PAID THE PRICE GOING CHEAP. BLACK DIAMOND WILL ALWAYS HAVE MY BUSINESS. THANKS!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT true to size
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used in snow yet, but they seem solid. But they are not true to size. They say up to size 12, maybe for a shoe but not a boot. I have a size 9.5 Vasque 7804 Snowburban ultraydry boot. I have to set the crampon to the max standard size for them to fit. So just make note of that. They do seem like great crampons, and were incredibly secure for strap on ones, albeit I have not actually used them yet. Just wanted to give a heads up about the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: I rented these for my Mt Rainier climb last year (with Koflach plastic boots). Worked geat! Easy to put on and take off, and stayed on tight the entire climb. I bought a pair this year. They fit both my Kolfach Degre plastic boots and my newer La Sportiva Trango boots. I think they are great.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hansen

product_meta.title: Black Diamond Contact Crampons
product_meta.description: Whenever you're climbing ice in frigid, brutal, but fun conditions, you're gonna need something on your side to make the climb easier, and Black Diamond's Contact Crampons have everything that you need. Made from a lightweight, but sturdy stainless Steel, these crampons can carry you just about anywhere without your body suffering, and a toe strap allows you to precisely place your foot in every slippery hold you encounter. Ready to get you prepared for just about anything, the Contact Crampons have everything that you need this winter. PRODUCT FEATURES: Flexible toe strap fits most footwear Compact and easy to use Includes dual-density ABS BD400069 , black diamond Contact Crampons , Contact Crampon black diamonds , black diamond Contact strap Crampons , Contact strap Crampon black diamonds , bd Contact Crampons , Contact Crampon bds , bd Contact strap Crampons , Contact strap Crampon bds , black dimaond strap crampons , strap crampon black diamonds , crampons , cram pons , cramp ons , ice climbing crampons , ice climbing tools , ice climbing footwear , ice climbing equipment , ice climbing accessories , ice climbing gear , black diamond crampons , black diamond cram pons , black diamond cramp ons , black diamond ice climbing crampons , black diamond ice climbing tools , black diamond ice climbing footwear , black diamond ice climbing equipment , black diamond ice climbing accessories , black diamond ice climbing gears , bd crampons , bd cram pons , bd cramp ons , bd ice climbing crampons , bd ice climbing tools , bd ice climbing footwear , bd ice climbing equipment , bd ice climbing accessories , bd ice climbing gearss
feature_bullets: Distinctive stainless steel construction doesn't rust, is more durable, resists snow balling and saves weight
New lower-profile fit for better contact with modern boots
Flexible toe strap fits most FOOTWEAR
